data.title: Top 40 Wedding Venues in Chateaugay, NY
data.meta_description: Find your perfect wedding venues in Chateaugay, NY at Zola. We'll help you narrow down your venue search in minutes.
data.text:
The Barns at Edgemont Inn consists of a 4400-square-foot custom-built event barn which, together with the historic Edgemont Inn and on-site lodging, sits on 20 acres of verdant hillside in the scenic Champlain Valley. Lodging that accommodates up to 23 people. The surrounding acreage contains a sweep of peaceful farmland and hardwood forest, etched by an old-fashioned stone fence. Views from the property extend out over Lake Champlain to the spectacular Green Mountains on the lake's eastern shore, and provide abundant photo opportunities and memories.

Hiland Park Country Club is Queensbury, New York's most scenic wedding venue. With over 400 acres of property and a 40,000-square-foot Club House, you will have a picturesque setting for your celebration at any time of the year. Over the years, this destination has hosted a large number of spectacular weddings, which ensures that it can deliver an environment and experience that no one else can!

When you decide to celebrate your wedding with us, you will have a 823-acre property, 25 acre private lake, 20 miles of private hiking and biking trails, the athletic fields and all camp buildings exclusively available to you and your guests, you also have the beauty and majesty of the Adirondack Park surrounding you. Located an hour north of Albany and just a 10 minute drive from either the south or north exit on I-87 we are perfectly located for your guests to find but also hidden away at the end of a private road, giving you a secluded, private experience. Plus you have the opportunity to design how you will spend your time on the property.

Our Rustic meets a modern twist, post and beam barn sits on 40+ acres of forest in the heart of Plattsburgh, New York. Located just 8 minutes from the Plattsburgh International airport PBG and minutes away from the local hotels and lodging. The barn is 6,000 sqft. and will host various events and weddings. Our venue offers an indoor/outdoor environment to create an open flow for events. With a patio area dressed in bistro lighting, fire pits and lounge seating, it is the perfect a glass of scotch sitting area. Or, grab a blanket, stick and marshmallow to roast over an open flame. There are so many options to create an indoor/ outdoor experience for your wedding or event. Inquire about our speciality bars and cocktail ideas. (S’mores bar, scotch bar, cigar bar and can-ibis bar etc.)

We are an upscale wedding venue with both inside and outside seating located directly on picturesque Lake Ontario with our 1600 square foot dock over it. The Barrack’s Inn stone center building was the first building built in the War of 1812 to be the bakery. It is on the historic national register. Inside we can seat 150 people, while outside we can seat an additional 100 people. We are happy to make any and all food requests and we feature all-inclusive packages which include: flowers, table decorating, music, photography, cake and desserts, ceremony, favors and all food and beverages.

Fort William Henry Hotel is a historic wedding venue located in Lake George, New York. This venue offers a picturesque setting in which to host your unforgettable wedding celebration. Couples and their guests can benefit from the first-class accommodations, amenities, and stunning views that this venue boasts. The 18-acre resort is the ideal location for romantic, waterfront weddings. They are able to host both indoor and outdoor weddings for their couples, expertly guiding them along the way to ensure a memorable, stress-free day.

Set sail with Waterfront Cruises, a yacht venue hosting weddings on one of two boats in the Lake George, New York area. Couples looking for a waterfront wedding can't get much closer to the water than aboard one of these ships, which have space for ceremonies and dining alike. These venues set sail from the southern shores of Lake George, conveniently located right off of I-87. Facilities and Capacity Couples can choose to celebrate their special day on one of two boats, which can hold as many as 400 guests. The Horicon, Waterfront Cruises’ wooden yacht stretching an impressive 85 feet long, shines with two glass-enclosed decks. The larger boat, the Adirondac, is a 115 luxury cruise ship trimmed with mahogany and cedar along all three decks and modeled after late 19th century touring ships. For couples seeking a waterfront venue but not quite sure of their sea legs, the Restaurant’s private deck hosts smaller and more intimate affairs.

Plan your dream Adirondack wedding with High Peaks Resort's dedicated wedding planning and catering staff. We'll create a special day that marks the beginning of your life together. "I Do" marks the beginning of your greatest adventure, but from "Will you marry me," to "Now introducing the newlyweds," a lot needs to happen. We stand by the statement that a High Peaks Resort wedding is a carefree wedding. We'll walk you through our three unique experiences to help you decide which of our Lake Placid reception venues works for you.

Snowhill Farm is a beautiful and tranquil wedding venue in Lake Placid, NY, set amidst 280 acres of breathtaking meadows and mountains. The venue embodies the essence of the Adirondacks without the typical twigs and plaid. The primary event space at Snowhill Farm is highly versatile, accommodating up to 80 guests indoors, including 14 overnight guests. For larger gatherings, we can set up a tent or enjoy an al fresco celebration on the expansive 15 acres of manicured lawns. The sweeping landscapes and rolling hills at Snowhill Farm are the ideal backdrop for your newlywed photographs with your partner and your closest friends and family. Fun facts - Built in 1961, the home was Herbert Kieckhefer's summer party house; Kieckhefer invented the modern milk carton. Peacock Mountain, named for the family who walked from Canada in the 1800s and built a nearby farmhouse, lies directly south.

Welcome to The Lincoln Loft & Studio. A gorgeous AND affordable Upstate New York wedding venue located in the heart of downtown, Watertown, New York. If you're here - it's probably because you're in search of the perfect place to marry your best friend. You may be looking for something a little different than the typical upstate NY barn venue, something that's not too far from home and picture perfect location to bring your wedding vision to life. We bet that you probably have already saved hundreds of inspiration photos and are wondering how these Pinterest weddings are even possible. It's kind of overwhelming, right? Well - that's where we come in. When you book a wedding at The Lincoln Loft -we include all of the pretty things that you've been saving to your Pinterest board. With over 5000+ specialty rentals and décor items to choose from, no two weddings at The Lincoln Loft will ever look the same. Are you ready to plan your AND affordable wedding with us?

The grounds of The Promise Gardens contain a cluster of rustic and charming barns, a babbling brook, and breathtaking mountain views. When viewing the property for the first time you can see why the original owners chose this spot to build their lives. The authenticity of these structures has been painstakingly maintained and guarded since 1965. Located in the heart of The Adirondacks, and so close to Lake George, The Promise Gardens is an ideal location for wedding weekends on the lake. We have lots of comfortable and well-appointed lodging options nearby, wonderful restaurants and nightlife options, and so many fun activities for you and your guests to enjoy. (Think hiking, boating, spas, museums, winery tours, and more!)

Nestled against the stunning backdrop of wooded pines and 35 acres of pristine Echo Lake, The Lodge is a rare gem and one of Adirondack’s most popular destination wedding venues. Whether you are looking for a single-day or a fun-filled weekend celebration, The Lodge is perfect for your special event! The Lodge on Echo Lake’s intimate size and pristine Adirondack location offers you, your families and guests a genuinely unique setting – that is warm, rustic and elegant – for your wedding celebration. Just 10 minutes from Lake George, The Lodge is famous for its service excellence, delicious cuisine and creatively planned wedding receptions and private functions. Your wedding will be talked about for years!

Welcome to Tanner Creek Farm, a historic 35-acre farm turned wedding and reception venue. We are located in DeKalb Junction, in the heart of the North Country Region of Upstate New York. We opened our farm for it’s first wedding in the summer of 2018, beginning with the marriage of our daughter. The newly renovated, 19th-century dairy barn serves as a memorable setting for any event. **Please visit tannercreekfarm. com to place an inquiry as we do not keep up with zola.**

A stunning rustic 1800s venue located in Upstate New York, nestled in over 100 acres of meadows, woodland, streams, ponds and a lake. Andelyn Farm is perfect for intimate weddings, events and retreats. Exclusive use of the grounds is available and we can accommodate up to 150 attendees. Andelyn Farm offers panoramic views, surrounded by nature and stunning scenery to capture your special and beautiful moment with your family and friends. We have a selection of ceremony locations to choose from to make your special day just the way you want it. Unrivaled beauty with our private lake, create and capture memories to treasure. This hidden gem is the dream natural beauty backdrop for your photography. Open-air ceremonies with breathtaking scenery for up to 175 seated guests. Andelyn Farm's wildflower field or natural woodlands are perfect locations for small and intimate ceremonies surrounded by natural beauty

Whiteface Club & Resort is a charming and versatile wedding venue located in Lake Placid, NY. This expansive resort offers stunning event spaces, accommodation rentals, TWO wedding planners, and much more to make your big day an unforgettable occasion. We offer beautiful indoor and outdoor event spaces to host all kinds of wedding occasions. Here, couples can stage their ceremony in the open air on the shores of Lake Placid. Your guests can be seated on the verdant lawn as you and your beloved exchange vows under the wooden ceremony arch. Afterwards, your guests can enjoy a relaxed cocktail hour within the Moose Lodge Boathouse Restaurant. While your guests sip champagne and mingle, you can enjoy a peaceful boat ride for two. For your main reception, the Adirondack Dining Room offers a warm and inviting atmosphere for a seated occasion. Wooden beams, rustic furniture, and a stone fireplace offer a cozy ambiance within this space, which can be decorated to suit your event style.

Blenheim Hill Farm is a heavenly wedding destination in the Catskills mountains. We grow the food and cook it for you in ​our ​own kitchen. You don't have to worry about outside catering, rentals, or even a planner. Our in-house team—at the farm and at our NYC restaurant—help you every step of the way, and everything is included. Our historic farmhouse ​onsite ​is a gorgeously appointed sanctuary for you and your family, and sleeps up to 20 guests. With over 15 years in farm-to-table dining and destination weddings, we are committed to hosting your best-day-ever with extraordinary attention to detail, making it a very personal experience. Please read our couples reviews. Blenheim is located a little over 2.5 hours from NYC.

When it comes to your wedding, the most important thing is you. Normanside is here to make your vision a reality with our tailored wedding packages. Our packages are designed to leave you happy and satisfied, but if anything needs to be altered to better suit your vision, our coordinator will be available to you, as a trusted resource you can rely on. We include chiavari chairs, custom linens, elegant glass ware & flatware- at no extra cost to you! We offer an on-site outdoor ceremony space that is covered with a retractable awning. The on-site ceremony space looks over the Normanskill Creek for perfect sunsets photos and guests' views.

Seven Ponds Farm is a heavenly spot way up in the Catskill mountains, with a dozen ponds and lakes, and pastures as long as the eye can see. GALLERY Seven Ponds is the new sister property of Blenheim Hill Farm, a well-known destination wedding venue with raving reviews. Seven Ponds has been designed to host smaller, intimate weddings from 75 guests up to 140 guests with the same magical qualities and attention to detail as our sister farm Blenheim.

Brookledge is a 60 acre, magical oasis set in the rolling hills of Saratoga, NY. We offer a serene space for weddings and private events, as well as cabins and glamping tents for rent. Brookledge is for the nature loving couple who wants to get married amidst the elements - think running streams, moody woods, sunshine, and crackling brooks. Located only 10 miles from Saratoga Springs, couples choose Brookledge for their weddings based on the location, privacy, and on-site lodging in a beautiful and serene setting.

We believe that every love story is beautiful and deserves the perfect setting for its most special day. With multiple ceremony sites to choose from, 700 private acres, a 740-acre lake, meadows, woods, gardens, mountain views, accredited culinary and service staff, dedicated wedding planners, luxury lodge, cabin & guest house accommodations, on-site spa and floral/décor services, an extensive list of seasonal activities – and breathtaking scenery all four seasons of the year – we believe that our resort just might be the right place for you.

Nestled in the serene foothills of Southern Vermont’s Green Mountains, The Hermitage Inn welcomes guests with its unique brand of mountain elegance and inviting hospitality. An extensive renovation of the property and grounds has brought a luxury country resort, award-winning culinary team, and 5-star guest experience to the Deerfield Valley. The Hermitage Inn features luxurious guest rooms with views of Haystack Mountain, a private carriage house, upscale dining options, and a garden patio. Set on 112 acres, the property features a trout pond, apple orchards, private gardens, hiking and cross country ski trails and a covered bridge. James Beard Award Winning Chef Michael Schlow and his team have partnered with local producers to create the best dining experience in Southern Vermont. From private dinners for 10 in our Wine Cellar, to tented affairs for 200 on our lawn, let our culinary and events team indulge your guests with our unique brand of mountain elegance and hospitality.

We are a very laid back team of husband and wife running his family's 6th generation family farm. We are rustic but also a charming, authentic Vermont experience. The barn can become incredibly elegant for a more formal affair but can also look just perfect with some simple, personal accents. Some of the great things that people love about our venue is our relaxed vibe, we are a BYOB facility and we allow any and all outside vendors. We can house up to 50 guests in the 4 houses that are available on our property. We also allow camping anywhere on the 350 acre property and we have an awesome "glamping site" available for rent as well. We are a weekend rental with the ability to add on days before and after the event to prepare and to relax after. We also have no curfews and encourage you and your guests to party in the barn or around the firepit all night long.

The Wedding Barn at Farmhouse Flowers is a picture-perfect wedding venue that offers you the beauty and warmth of our hand-crafted timber frame barn built by local master craftsmen. Tradition meets function in the 2100sq/ft main floor and 600 sq.ft loft, overlooking the flower gardens, more than enough space for over 150 guests and dancing. Nestled among the flower gardens of perennials and annuals the wedding barn opens onto a hillside pasture and a walking path that crosses a small bridge and leads to the hilltop wedding site. A true Vermont wedding venue from soil to sky. Surrounded by wildflowers, the hilltop site overlooks the entire flower farm, wedding barn, the onsite 3 bedroom house, cornfields, and views of the Worcester Mountain Range. Your guests will enjoy strolling among the flowers while enjoying cocktails in the wedding barn and around the pond, both of which are central to this Vermont wedding venue.

At The Tillerman, we like to make people feel at home. We are an inn, restaurant and event space restored and reimagined from its 1790’s bones and we’re all about the small, meaningful details that create sense of place. When folks leave here they feel like they have had an experience that feeds the soul. Our food is impeccably sourced from local farms, producers, vendors, makers and ranchers. We are entirely committed to quality and keeping our food simple and rustic. We want our guests to feel like they're going to a big dinner party at their friend’s house who also happens to be the best cook and host they know. Our vibe is old New England meets northern California meets a flower market meets a farmers market meets a warm, vibrant community. Everyone is welcome at The Tillerman. We are inclusive of all races, disabilities, ages, sexual orientations, religions, languages… We love love, and we’d love to meet you!

Sugarbush Resort is a mountain destination wedding venue in Warren, Vermont. Located in Vermont’s picturesque Mad River Valley, the resort specializes in offering you a full wedding weekend experience. Between our three event venues, there are many options for your wedding, welcome and farewell events. In addition, there are a variety of lodging options ranging from slope-side luxury accommodations to quaint New England-style Inns. Guests can also maximize the full wedding getaway with a round of golf at our award-winning golf course, enjoy a hike or scenic lift ride through the Green Mountain National Forest or head into the local villages to visit the Waitsfield Farmers Market, Lawson's brewery, local shops, and general stores. With our dedicated on-site wedding coordinators, plenty of stunning venue spaces to choose from, and customizable food and beverage offerings, Sugarbush has everything you need to create the wedding celebration you envision.

Windham Manor is a breathtaking new wedding venue located in the beautiful Catskill mountain town of Windham, NY. Our serene 45-acre property features a beautiful, newly renovated twelve bedroom Victorian mansion, which can accommodate up to 24 overnight guests. The stunning home features an on-site gym; spa; full service kitchen; ADA accommodations; private bathrooms; incredible views; and more. It's the perfect space for a welcome reception, rehearsal dinner, brunch, or a small wedding. The property also boasts a newly-constructed luxury reception barn, which can hold up to 300 guests for dinner and dancing. It features a covered patio overlooking a small waterfall and pond; a large bar area; a bridal suite; a stone fireplace; and so much more. The space includes farm tables and chairs. Should you choose to hold your wedding ceremony indoors, the barn is the perfect space. We also offer various outdoor ceremony locations throughout the property - one more beautiful than the next!

Our private climate controlled and handicap accessible 8,000sf venue is set amid rolling green pastures, and intoxicating vistas of the rolling hills, streams, waterfalls, and meadows. Enjoy the fresh air and pristine views from 206 acres nestled on the banks of the Cowasselon Creek, in Madison County’s picturesque countryside. ​​ Our spectacular setting will give you uniquely creative photo opportunities, as well as, a one-of-a-kind destination that offers you complete privacy for your next gathering. It offers the perfect backdrop for your intimate ceremony, reception, shower, corporate picnic, wedding or other celebratory event, along with an unforgettable experience. ​​ ​Pairing romance and charm with simple luxuries and privacy, the estate will offer a secluded slice of paradise. We look forward to sharing the special spirit of our land with you!

Seriously awesome extended weekend weddings for unconventional, creative and adventurous couples! Why squeeze your wedding into one day when you can celebrate all weekend long in gorgeous upstate New York? With three full nights included in our wedding packages you have so much time to celebrate! We provide an extended wedding experience that allows our guests to immerse themselves into the weekend with a customized itinerary in a comfortable environment. We host all your wedding events in one place, so you never feel rushed and can wake up rested on your wedding day. Chances are you value quality relationships, love getting creative, exploring the outdoors, and enjoy meaningful experiences. You are likely pretty laid back and are looking for a space where you can fully enjoy your wedding with plenty of time to celebrate. You also want your guests to leave in awe of how awesome your wedding weekend was! Plan your destination wedding with us!

Discover The Rosemary at Spano Lake - the latest addition to Upstate New York's stunning outdoor wedding and events venues. Just a short drive from the historical town of Cooperstown, The Rosemary offers a picturesque setting for your special occasion. Encompassing a vast expanse of 325 acres, this private waterfront location is surrounded by breathtaking natural beauty, making it the perfect choice for your wedding or private gathering. Experience the magic of a secluded and intimate celebration beside the tranquil waters of our private lake, creating unforgettable moments that will be treasured forever.

Situated on the grounds of a historic beanery, Hartlot Happening is a reclaimed industrial event space conveniently located 5 miles from the village of Skaneateles and close to Route 5. We offer a modern, industrial environment with an urban vibe in a private, rural setting. Our 19th-century concrete buildings have been thoughtfully updated to preserve their character. The venue and courtyard combined offer over 3000 square feet of versatile space. The courtyard can be tented in case of inclement weather. ​ Hartlot Happening offers both indoor and outdoor options for your special day. Whether you prefer an indoor or outdoor celebration, Hartlot Happening has you covered. With a capacity of up to 120 guests, our venue caters to intimate gatherings and larger weddings alike.

Exchange vows under an ancient maple tree, enjoy cocktails in the barnyard, and dine and dance the night away under soaring barn ceilings and twinkling lights. At Weatherhead Hollow, we’re here to help you celebrate, unwind, and create unforgettable memories. Our historic Southern Vermont Farmstead features overnight accommodations for 12 guests in a Farmhouse and Carriage Barn + unlimited events in a stunning Barn event space, surrounded by rolling fields and mountain views of the hollow — all for you to enjoy over a long weekend. We're featured in the 2024 winter edition of atHOME New England magazine for impeccable interior design. This isn’t a typical corporate event venue. When not hosting weddings, we support the creative economy in Vermont through fully funded artist residencies. Similar to how we support artists, as an event venue, we offer an unhurried environment over a 4 day weekend where you will have the freedom to create the weekend itinerary of your choice.

At Hayloft on the Arch we are more than just a DIY venue. We offer extensive coordinating with any package you choose. That means, throughout your planning process we are here to call on with any questions regarding vendors, the timeline, the floor plan of your event, etc. And the day of? Aunt Suzie can rest - we have it all under control! You drop off your decor & we set it up to your specifications. We are on site from the first person who arrives until the end of the event & your belongings are repackaged, making sure your day runs smooth & on schedule.

Our historic, nineteenth-century, recently renovated barn is surrounded by natural beauty with picturesque rolling green pastures grazed by Angus cows and Border Leceister sheep, as well as hay fields, and crop and cut flower fields. Our stately barn sits at the top of a hill overlooking the Vloman Kill. Our family has farmed this land in Albany County, NY for over two hundred years and we would like to share this beautiful property with you for your special day.

Nestled in the Green Mountains of Vermont, the Mad River Barn is situated on 17 beautiful acres of gardens, woodlands and streams. Hosting only one event each week allows us to offer a weekend-long destination experience that you & your guests will enjoy and remember forever. On the hill behind the Main Barn, our state-of-the-art post & beam pavilion provides couples with a rustic, elegant space for dinner & dancing on Saturday evening. This space is conveniently located next to the ceremony site and encompasses a stunning pergola. The Main Barn building is home to 8 of 18 inn rooms, as well as both our dining room & pub. Adjacent to the Main Barn is the Farmhouse, housing two bunk-style rooms. Just across the parking lot sits the Longhouse & Annex comprised of an additional eight inn rooms and offering a bit of privacy from the hustle & bustle of the main events.

Discover the Vermont destination wedding of your dreams! Say your vows outdoors, surrounded by sweeping views of the Green Mountains, enjoy cocktails on the terrace, then dance the night away in a gorgeous marble pavilion tent, with white silk drapery. Continue the celebration with an after party in the mansion’s Billiard Room Bar, or a bonfire party with s'mores. We offer onsite lodging for up to 125 guests. Resort activities include pool, tennis, lawn games, sculpture gardens and woods trails. Start the weekend with an outdoor Rehearsal Dinner BBQ or farm to table fare from our organic farm. Get ready with all your bridal party in the historic mansion's bridal suite, then make a grand entrance descending the marble staircase. Summer weddings for up to 225. Winter mansion weddings for up to 75 guests. We include a dedicated coordinator, onsite catering and bar services. Most of the lodging is dog-friendly.

Imagine your wedding at Saratoga National Golf Club, a unique jewel in this city renowned for stunning architecture, legendary mineral springs, then you arrive at the clubhouse, welcomed by an over-sized foyer elegantly appointed with rich woodwork, ceramic tile, custom murals and ornate chandeliers. Inside, the rooms range from grand to small and intimate. Outside, guests can relax on the covered terrace porch and patio amid fire pits and an infinity pool, all with views of the golf course. Wedding planning and catering at Saratoga National Golf Club are provided exclusively by Prime at Saratoga National. For local couples, or brides and grooms from out of town looking for a unique destination, Saratoga National is the perfect place to exchange vows and create memories you'll cherish forever. From rehearsal dinners and post-wedding brunches to ceremonies and wedding receptions, Saratoga National Golf Club is the perfect venue for all your wedding-related events.

Living Stone is an enchanted forest wedding venue in the Catskills- an exquisite handmade open air Pavilion nestled in the woods of the Catskills, with our very own waterfall. Onsite catering, full liquor license, and all the amenities of a state of the art facility, but in the woods. Contact us to set up a site visit to come and see our unique venue in person, and take the first step in hosting the wedding of your dreams!

Discover the enchanting charm of L'Orangerie, a Victorian greenhouse nestled in the picturesque Hudson Valley. Our unique venue, with its European-inspired design and lush surroundings, offers a magical setting for your wedding day, where every moment feels like a fairytale. Step into a world of romantic elegance and natural splendor. Our beautiful Victorian greenhouse provides an ethereal backdrop for your ceremony and reception. With its stunning glass architecture and abundant greenery, L'Orangerie effortlessly combines old-world sophistication with the beauty of nature. Set beside a tranquil pond and surrounded by sprawling fields and serene woods, our venue offers a variety of breathtaking settings for your special day. Thank you for considering L'Orangerie. We look forward to being a part of your love story. We are a raw space and do not offer any services other than the rental of the event spaces. Nothing else is included in the rental fee and all vendors must be brought in.

When you get married at Ashling, you get the entire property to yourself. From your rehearsal to your day-after brunch, it's all yours. We handle the tent, tables, chairs, and bathroom trailer. Plus we have a wedding coordinator on-site for you, along with unique accommodations for 20 people. You choose your caterer and DJ, and we make it happen.

Finding the perfect wedding venue can be a daunting task. The Merrill Family Terrace offers breathtaking views of Lake Champlain and the Adirondacks. With a hardwood deck, covered overhang open on three sides, the Terrace allows for a ceremony, reception and dancing all in one! Let us help you celebrate your memorable day. The Community Sailing Center is a lively hub on the shores of Lake Champlain, less than a mile from downtown Burlington, VT, where community members and visitors gather to laugh, learn, and play on the lake together. In 2017, the Community Sailing Center completed construction of the first new building on the Burlington Waterfront in over 20 years. Starting in 2018, this beautiful new facility is available to the community to rent for gatherings and events. Be one of the first to celebrate your special occasion in this purpose-built, Net Zero building and support our mission to provide lake access, recreation, and education for all.

Imagine a collection of historic inns, restored to luxury, with beautiful balconies and porches overlooking pristine Cayuga Lake. Picture sweeping lawns that roll down to the water’s edge, where the sun sets each night in a riot of golden hues. Add exquisite artwork, from-scratch meals, and all of the on-site assistance you never knew you needed. Visit and see why we’ve been hailed by BRIDES as the “perfect place for a weekend wedding” and by Country Living as “America’s best-kept secret.”

Our beautiful barn is full of history, charm and character! It’s naturally beautiful. It’s rustic with a touch of elegance. It’s comfortable, humble and inviting. A place where friends and family gather to share stories, love and laughter. So, come check us out! We would love to hear from you and show you around because the time we spend with you is the reason we exist!!

Izzo's White Barn Winery is a family owned and operated, New York State licensed farm winery. We are located in beautiful Upstate New York, between Syracuse and Rochester in the award-winning Finger Lakes Wine Region. At Izzo's you have the benefit of holding your private event not only at a winery but also in our rustic one-hundred-year-old barn. The “White Barn” is a blank canvas and flourishes between late May and early October. With the options that we offer we have the flexibility and staff to meet your unique needs. We're excited to work with you and help bring your vision to life.

Blending history with modernity. SKY Armory is an urban, chic venue in the heart of downtown Syracuse NY. Featuring three loft-style ballrooms that can accommodate events from 50-900 guests. Whether you’re planning a wedding, a gala, or a corporate event, we’ll take care of all the details. Our event teams work closely with our clients to create not just events, but experiences that are extraordinary and memorable. Each couple getting married at SKY Armory falls in love (pun intended) with how flexible we are with our event spaces. We like to say 'mi casa, su casa' because we want you to know that when you're in our home, it's your home and want your style reflected in all aspects of the celebration. Instead of saying 'no,' we find a way.

We offer a classic Vermont farmhouse in an idyllic setting. Nestled along the Mad River, a stone’s throw from downtown Waitsfield, we delight in offering a rustic-romantic setting for events from casual to elegant and everything in between. Declare your vows under the open sky in our expansive meadows. Celebrate your special day with family and friends in our rustic barn pavilion. Dine on a locally sourced artisanal meal served from a roaring outdoor wood-fired oven, wood-fired smoker & grill. Spend your wedding weekend with your loved ones in our charming country Inn.

Juniper Springs Wedding Barn offers a 3,920 square foot timber frame event space and barn wedding venue. Featuring spacious ten-foot high barn door openings on both ends and retractable sides, your event can enjoy an open air atmosphere while still being shielded from the elements. Situated near Albany, NY and Saratoga Springs, NY, it stands out as one of the rare rustic yet contemporary barn wedding venues in New York. If we do not connect here, please do not hesitate to contact us directly, that's the quickest way to get a quote. Thank you!

The West Mountain Inn was originally built as a farmhouse in 1809. From 1880 to 1920, first a gristmill and then a lumber mill were operated on the Battenkill River at the foot of the mountain. In 1904 Ned and Gwendolyn Rochester purchased the 150 acre farm and began to transform it into an elegant summer estate. After a succession of other residents the estate later became an arts and retreat center.

The Summit Lodge is an exclusive resort. We will only host one wedding per weekend. The entire property is yours for up to 4 days and 3 nights! We can host 50 to 200 people for your ceremony and reception, and can house up to 130 in our cozy lodge. We have 10 acres of beautifully manicured grounds with tons of charm and character inside and out. Outside there are 2 beautiful saltwater pools, fire pit, life-size chess/checkers, horseshoes, corn-hole, shuffleboard, bocce, and an oversized chef’s grill that’s perfect for welcome parties and back yard barbecues. Inside we have O’Dwyer’s Poolside Bar, perfect for cocktail hour, welcome parties, and outside dining. O’Dwyer’s Pub is the ideal spot for rehearsal dinners and after parties. We boast a 15-person saltwater hot tub, billiards, darts, and a photo booth. Stream your ceremony in real time with sound for those who are unable to be with you on your special day.

From the minute you arrive at Upstate New York’s finest farm and vineyard venue, you will be enamored by the historic charm and rustic elegance that defines Stablegate Farm and Vineyard. Fall in love with the 19th-century Stablegate Barn filled with charming antique decor and ambient market-street lighting. For more intimate gatherings, our Stablegate Lodge provides guests with a warm, inviting atmosphere to celebrate. Choose from a private vineyard, a hilltop view of the Catskill mountains, a 200-year-old Dutch barn door, or a fossil stone fireplace for your Upstate New York ceremony.

The Lincklaen House is a historic wedding venue and grand hotel in Cazenovia, New York. The space is an elegant and unique site that will create a romantic ambiance for your special day. The Lincklaen House has been a welcoming and comfortable venue for travelers and betrothed couples alike for over 180 years, even having housed President and Mrs. Grover Cleveland. Their experienced staff will make you feel at home, and the meals will leave you talking about them for years to come. The stunning architecture provides the perfect backdrop for photos, inside and outside. With a wedding at The Lincklaen House, your memories will last a lifetime.

Sleepy Hollow’s Round Barn and Pavilion feature a majestic view of Vermont’s famed Camel’s Hump from the large reception area that can accommodate up to 165 guests. Have your wedding ceremony by the pond, cocktails under the pavilion and dance the night away in the 17 sided Round Barn. Included in our wedding package is a two-night stay in our eight distinctively decorated guest rooms. Each offers beautiful views of the surrounding mountains or our pond. Awaken each morning to a delicious breakfast. We also allow camping for weddings and have a bonfire pit. Your guests will enjoy the lovely grounds and over 30 miles of trails where they can hike, bike or cross country ski. Let Sleepy Hollow set a wonderful atmosphere for your special day!

Recently voted “One of the 16 Best Destination Wedding Venues in the United States” by BRIDES, Unlike any other Vermont wedding venue. Located in the picturesque destination of Manchester, Vermont, the Taconic is inspired by New England's grand inns of the 19th & 20th centuries. This stunning location features 86 accommodations complimented by warm and welcoming event spaces designed for memorable gatherings. The Taconic features inviting event space with an indoor ballroom, outdoor terrace, and event lawn...perfect for celebrating with loved ones, as the only wedding that day! We take pride in delivering restaurant quality cuisine for our catered events, no matter how intimate or grand. Elevated bar offerings compliment farm-to-fork cuisine, incorporating classic cocktails, artisanal spirits and a wide selection of Vermont craft beers. Our 2024 wedding package starts at $145 per person and we can tailor our wedding package based on your budget and vision for your wedding.

Nestled in the sleepy Equinox Valley where the cloud’s kiss lingers on the mountains, our exquisitely restored 250-year-old farm rests along Vermont’s famed Battenkill River. Frost Moon Mountain is located in Manchester Center just a few hours North of New York City and Northwest of Boston. Once a working farm, the remnants of our agricultural history provide an air of nostalgia so prominent it’s palpable. Though the horse’s stalls are gone, we’ve preserved Frost Moon Mountain’s heritage by retaining much of its original charm while updating amenities to today’s contemporary standards of comfort and luxury. Our peaceful mountain escape combines bohemian sensibility with rustic radiance - the perfect backdrop for any event or gathering.

At Arrowhead Golf Course you will be able to have the wedding that you’ve envisioned for so long. You and your fiance can relax knowing that every step of the way, you will have an event manager guiding you through the process; from decorations, to planning your menu, to making sure things go smoothly on your big day. With the golf course as your backdrop, we know your guests will enjoy celebrating with you as you vow your love to one another and dance the night away. We look forward to celebrating with you!

Looking for one of the best Upstate New York wedding venues? We have you covered! With acres of outdoor access, our three unique venues nestled between landscaped gardens, a dedicated location for a tent ,and a cottage on-site - we are the perfect place to host your entire weekend with ease. We include much in our packages, like the climate comforts and decor, lounges, and even a planning package with Elizabeth Moore of Paper Crane Calligraphy to save you time and stress so you can celebrate.

Our goal is to understand your wedding vision and to bring that vision to life. Offering innovative gourmet food and service, the staff of the Glen Sanders Mansion manages every detail of your wedding to ensure that your expectations are exceeded. We can help coordinate every wedding-related event, from the rehearsal dinner to the post-wedding breakfast. Whether having a traditional sit-down dinner, cocktail reception, or anything in-between, your cuisine and service are always held to the highest standards. With our many wedding package options and the ability to customize them to meet your needs and traditions, you know that your wedding will be able to both exceed your dreams and stay within your budget.

Our gorgeous country estate set in the heart of Vermont is the backdrop for your curated celebration. Curated just for you, our experienced team handles every detail of your weekend so that you can enjoy your wedding from the first hello to the last kiss goodbye. Local foods are crafted into a meal you will be proud to share with your family and friends.

Congratulations, and thank you for considering The Sherwood Inn for your special occasion! We offer service excellence and professionalism in a warm, friendly and uniquely beautiful setting in the heart of the village. The Sherwood Inn has been a popular venue for weddings for over two centuries. With its beautiful scenic views of Skaneateles Lake and its setting in the midst of the historic Village of Skaneateles, our beautifully restored colonial inn creates an idyllic setting for any wedding.

The 571-acre Scott Farm, a The Landmark Trust USA property, is home to 130 varieties of ecologically-grown heirloom apples and other fine fruits, a seasonal Farm Market, and the Apple Barn Event Center. All 23 buildings on the property are listed on the National Register of Historic Places. A popular wedding venue, the farm is surrounded by four authentically-restored historic year-round vacation rental properties accommodating up to 22 guests—one of which is Rudyard Kipling’s Naulakha where he penned the Jungle Book. The Stone Trust Education Center, located in the 1862 Barn, showcases beautiful, unique dry-stone wall installations around the property. The Apple Barn accommodates up to 120 guests, has a commercial kitchen, three restrooms, one is wheelchair accessible. Overlooking the farm and mountains, a delightful spot for special occasions, rehearsal dinners, and wedding receptions. Exchange vows in the Courtyard or by a pond overlooking the apple orchard and stonewalls.

Imagine twinkling lights, farm-to-table fare, and your closest friends gathered under the expansive Vermont Sky. Farm Road Estate is the quintessential Vermont wedding destination uniquely suited to host weekend-long wedding celebrations and large events. Located in West Dover, VT near the base of Mount Snow, this stunning property is spread across 32acres, an easy drive from anywhere in New England. Farm Road Estate offers a variety of locations for all your wedding needs. We offer numerous ceremony locations: Beside the picturesque ponds, on the beautiful 1450 sqft bluestone terrace, or in our enchanted forest. Our newly renovated Great Room - once an 18th century sawmill - features exposed beams, wood floors, elegant chandeliers, and a large fireplace provides incredible ambiance for an indoor reception. We can also host up to 300 guests outdoors! Accommodations on-site for up to 96 guests! Come see why Forbes listed this property as one of the most romantic Inns in the world.

We are excited you are considering Anne’s Washington Inn as a potential venue for your celebration! Situated on four acres, conveniently set amid the arts, culture and natural beauty that define Saratoga Springs, Anne's Washington Inn is the perfect setting for weddings, rehearsal dinners, and bridal brunches. Consisting of two Victorian country houses, with a total of 18 overnight rooms, our accommodations welcome and pamper your guests. Victorian decor with traditional accents follow you throughout bright, cheery rooms enhanced by antique furnishings, fluffy comforters, tapestries, sparkling mirrors and sunny windows. The key to your wonderful weekend is that when you reserve our dining room, grounds and all 18 guest rooms, you and your family and friends are the only people at the inn, giving you exclusive use of our venue.

The Pruyn House is the Cultural and Historical Center for the Town of Colonie. We have a five and 1/2 acre property, including the House, the Buhrmaster Barn, the Verdoy Schoolhouse and several other buildings. We provide access to the Barn for the reception, the garden for the ceremony, the birch grove for the cocktail hour and dressing areas in the Pruyn House and the Verdoy Schoolhouse. Tables and chairs are included. All else must be provided through rental services and catering. We have one security person who will be on site throughout your event. All else provided by caterer or rental service.

Centrally Located in Auburn, NY in the Heart of the Finger Lakes and Wine Country. We would love to host your family and friends as they celebrate this joyous moment in your life with you! The Holiday Inn Auburn ~ Finger Lakes, would love for you to consider us as the host of your upcoming shower, rehearsal dinner, overnight guest rooms and wedding reception! Ease your mind, relax, and allow us to take care of each and every detail of your special day. On-site Burger Theory restaurant and lounge, comfortable and welcoming atrium, and sparkling indoor pool, we have something to offer all of your guests for any of your very important events! Each package includes passed and displayed hors d’oeuvres, fresh garden salad, and several plated and buffet menu options. Exceptional customer service is our ultimate goal. Weddings to remember and a night you truly can enjoy are waiting for you at the Holiday Inn Auburn ~ Finger Lakes!

Welcome! We are honored that you are considering the Takk House for your celebration! We pride ourselves on creating custom experiences for all of our couples. Here at Takk House, no wedding is alike and we love it that way. Here's to creating amazing memories together! Now let's party!

Our gift to you Our dream is big but simple. We love Adena and want to turn her into something even more wonderful. While she has a rich history, she is also young and growing, and for this, we need your participation. As our name suggest, we envision a larger orchard and winery and hope to get there with your involvement. You are the seed to grow Adena Orchard & Vine. For all events held with us, a fruit tree will be planted in honor of your event. This will be your tree and you are always invited back. Your involvement will connect you to this special place on earth for years to come. Put roots down at Adena Orchard & Vine and become a part of something special.

The petite Pond House offers a setting for cocktail hours or after parties. Wherever you decide to host your celebration on the grounds, you will surely be followed by the area's beauty and enjoy a unique celebration experience. Services Offered As you host your wedding at The Kaaterskill, you can avail of the many services and amenities available to you. From a get-ready suite for your pre-ceremony preparations to essential event rentals to decorate your space, the venue can provide it. The in-house coordinator will also work closely with you to understand your ideas and needs to ensure a seamless planning process. Besides weddings, the property can throw engagement parties, rehearsal dinners, and birthdays. Outside vendors can also work on the premises to ensure everything is tailored to your vision. Moreover, once your festivities have concluded, you and a few important guests can stay overnight in the comfortable on-site accommodations.

Rich in familial history, Heritage Barn at the Dunham Homestead is a wedding venue located in Hamilton, NY. The property stretches over 200 acres, featuring undulating hills that allow for panoramic views of Chenango Valley. You can set up an aisle of your own design and exchange your vows. It maintains its classic, rich wooden interior and features a high vaulted ceiling, giving it a distinctly hallowed aesthetic. Boasting a capacity of up to 300 guests, there is ample room for each of your loved ones.

Nestled in this rich, historic landscape, Springside Inn continues to offer the best of Finger Lakes' atmosphere and hospitality. Springside Inn is located across the road from the western shore of Owasco Lake, one of the Finger Lakes. Every event held at Springside Inn is guaranteed to be as unique and unforgettable as the couple being celebrated.

Happily ever after begins at The Otesaga Resort Hotel. Celebrate together in a timeless setting with century-old oak trees and glistening crystal chandeliers. Soft moonlight on shimmering waters. Champagne and passed hors-d'oeuvres. Feel the undeniable romance of a luxurious lakeside wedding that's infused with sophistication and charm. Whether you're planning an intimate al fresco reception by the water or an opulent party in the ballroom. Your guests will know that they're in for a treat from the moment they arrive at our magnificent mansion, with soaring columns and an imposing front portico that exude majesty and grace. Be enchanted by moments of whimsy and delight: candid photos on the dance floor, stolen kisses on the waterfront, ice cream sandwiches on the Veranda. Come together with family and friends to honor true love with a celebration that's simply perfect.

Let our beautiful 400-acre farm be the backdrop to your picturesque Vermont wedding or event. Our raw venue site sits on the side of a mountain, looking back across our family farm’s valleys, fields, and mountains. The site is located on the mountain across from our farmhouse and the area was made to accommodate a large event tent, it is approximately a 60’x200’ area. In addition to our venue site, we also have multiple possible ceremony locations available. Our farm is only a short drive from beautiful Brattleboro, Vermont, allowing accessible lodging for any guests traveling to help you celebrate your special day. With the help of our local and trusted vendors, we can help you create your Vermont dream wedding with our beautiful family farm as your priceless backdrop. A preferred vendor list of caterers, photographers, DJs, rental services, hotels, and more is available upon request.

A resort-style wedding venue in Waterloo, New York, del Lago Resort & Casino is the ideal location for dream-worthy weddings. From luxurious amenities to exceptional service, the venue offers everything its couples need to craft the perfect celebration. Rich with homegrown hospitality and small-town values, del Lago is the premier destination to accommodate all the needs of your special day. del Lago is conveniently located in the heart of the Finger Lakes centrally located between both Rochester and Syracuse, NY. Our location also offers our guests the pleasure of visiting and experiencing one of the top destination regions in the country where only a short drive away to a plethora of wineries, distilleries as well as a variety of museums, hiking trails and more.

We are hoping to create a memorable experience in our extraordinary setting. We are located at the beautiful historic old Sinclair Chair Factory built in 1871 on Skaneateles Creek. With gorgeous views and attention to historic detail, our goal is to produce a unique setting to create memories of a lifetime. Guests have all day access, will be the only event occurring in our facility that day, and have 100% of our attention! We are only 1.9 miles from the center of Skaneateles village. The village offers a multitude of attractions with many great eateries, bars, clothing stores, antique shops and more. Also, the lake provides a great opportunity for fun activities with friends and family.

Since 1914, the Boyden Family has been farming these majestic Lamoille River valley fields at the intersection of Route 104 and 15 in Cambridge, Vermont. What began as a predominantly dairy farm through the years has evolved into naturally raised beef cattle, field crops, maple production, wine & spirits, weddings and events. Patriarch Fred Boyden and his wife, Diancy have two sons. Mark and David have been ingeniously innovative the last 20 years growing the farm to focus on moving forward in their businesses which continue to enrich the entire farm. Alongside Mark and David are their wives, Lauri and Linda who are instrumental with their own creative additions to the farm and winery with unique ways of keeping Boyden Farm vibrant. Lauri is the venue coordinator at The Barn for all of the exceptional weddings and events. You will find her and her staff working diligently alongside the event vendors to assist in creating a fabulous celebration each and every time.

At Common Ground Center, you’ll find everything you need for the wedding day you’ve imagined – beautiful rustic facilities, breathtaking mountain scenery, and the freedom to bring your ideas to life. This is a place where your family and friends can gather, relax, and celebrate for a whole weekend while enjoying nature, exclusive site use, and each other. Our 700-acre camp is available from mid-May to mid-October and can accommodate up to 200 ceremony guests. Common Ground is located just 30 minutes from Burlington, Vermont, allowing for easy travel for family and friends coming from far away. This venue is the ideal place for DIY-minded couples who have that picturesque, green, rustic Vermont wedding in mind. With a variety of venues for small and medium-sized celebrations, each space offers plenty of flexibility for you to arrange and decorate however you’d like.
